name: City Game Studio
description: You are the founder of your video game company. The starting point belongs to you, in your garage, or think big instead of small by acquiring your first location. At the end of the day, your decisions will make your studio a success and will mark the Video Game History.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Single Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (1280x720) Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Stéréo
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (1600x900) Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Stéréo
